text: AWS Redshift | Palo Alto, CA or Seattle, WA | Full-Time, Onsite | https://aws.amazon.com/redshift/ We switched off one of the world's largest, if not the largest, Oracle data warehouse and moved it over to Redshift. There are unique challenges with scale and elasticity due to our customers demands. Work with some of the smartest and humble engineers in the industry. Email: moonjo@amazon.com to learn more.
